data.name: Cursed Town Demo
data.detailed_description:
Fast Driver is a game about racing and simulation, drive around the city and compete in different challenges.


Demo Features.

-Control multiple vehicles.
-Discover the game map by exploring all locations.
-Enjoy with unique style graphics.
data.about_the_game:
Fast Driver is a game about racing and simulation, drive around the city and compete in different challenges.


Demo Features.

-Control multiple vehicles.
-Discover the game map by exploring all locations.
-Enjoy with unique style graphics.
data.short_description: Drive around the city and compete in diferent challenges

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP (SP3) or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (Merom) 1.66GHz or equivalent
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics Media Accelerator 950 or equivalent
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo (Penryn) 2.53 GHz or equivalent
  • Graphics: Intel Graphics Media Accelerator 4500MHD or equivalent
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
